author: CBC News
title: Whether above ground or sheltering in a car park, normalcy evades Kyiv citizens as Russia invades Ukraine | CBC News
description: Kyiv feels like a ghost town these days, but Lydia Sokolova, 74, was one of the few citizens on the streets of Ukraine's capital ahead of a weekend curfew, determined to feed her son's cat. Others, however, have sheltered underground. Day-to-day life in Kyiv …
content:
As the minutes ticked down Saturday to the start of a weekend curfew in Kyiv, Lydia Sokolova was one of the few ordinary citizens out on the streets of the Ukrainian capital.
